channel.title: fundamentals on Stencil
channel.description: Recent content in fundamentals on Stencil

item.title: Install Stencil
item.description: There is lots of talk about “Stencil being written in Go”, but you don’t need to install Go to enjoy Stencil. Just grab a precompiled binary! Stencil is written in Go with support for multiple platforms. The latest release can be found at Stencil Releases. Stencil currently provides pre-built binaries for the following: macOS (Darwin) for x64, i386, and ARM architectures Windows Linux Stencil may also be compiled from source wherever the Go toolchain can run; e.
